KoI Documentation¶

History¶

This simulation was developed in the KoI project http://www.koi-projekt.de. It is partially based on older simulation software, coming out of RWTH Aachen, TU Berlin, KTH Stockholm, and Paderborn University. A grateful hattip to all the work that preceeded this one!

This simulator was used in and developed in the context of the followin papers (among others):

    1. Bohge, J. Gross, and A. Wolisz

“Optimal Soft Frequency Reuse and Dynamic Sub-carrier Assignments in Cellular OFDMA Networks” Transactions on Emerging Telecommunications Technologies, vol. 21, no. 8, pp. 704–713, 2010.

    1. Parruca and J. Gross

“Throughput Analysis of Proportional Fair Scheduling For Sparse and Ultra-Dense Interference-Limited OFDMA/LTE Networks” IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications, vol. 15, no. 10, pp. 6857-6870, 2016.
